$id.description: This is the internal ID for the originating source of the rental

$marketingReferenceId.description: If you have a different marketing ID to the main reference ID you can supply an additional reference code.

$brand.description: This field can be used to set a brand grouping for the rental. If you need to designate a rental as originating from a particular brand you can set any value you like.

isActive.description: Designates if this property is active.

isInstantBookable.description: Designates if this property is instant bookable and can accept payments online.

isDraft.description: Designates if this property is a draft and should not be published yet.

isPublishedToChannels.description: Designates if this property is available to be published to external channels.

+changeover.description: Preloaded changeover Information. 3 = can arrive and depart on date. 2 = can depart only. 1 = can arrive only. 0 = unavailable for anything.

items.description: ISO 639-1 code. For example: en, fr, de, es.

unitAllocatedReference.description: If this listing is on a complex or a bed and breakfast, or a pitch on a site, it will usually have a reference ID or an allocation number.
